responses: Our utmost priority is to ensure the well-being of our drivers and foster a positive company culture. In fact one of our employees had this to say about us,'The best part about driving for Scottie’s Transportation is working with people who truly look out for each other and always willing to help with any problems. The family atmosphere, great pay, and the open door policy with leadership makes Scottie’s Transportation a great place to work.'

patterns: How do you all enforce safety
do you all have a good safety record
responses: At Scotty's Transportation, safety stands as our utmost priority. To maintain a steadfast commitment to safety within our company, we require prospective drivers to possess a minimum of two years of accident-free and citation-free driving experience. We also monitor CSA scores

patterns: what happens if i have an emergency
if my truck breaks down who helps
how do you all handle break downs
who do i call if i need help
responses: Here at Scotty's Transportation, we prioritize breakdown prevention. Our fleet consists exclusively of equipment no older than 3 years, ensuring the reliability of our equipment. In the rare event of a breakdown, rest assured that our 24/7 Breakdown Center is fully operational and ready to assist you promptly. For any health-related emergencies, please dial 911 for immediate assistance.
